â€“ Team and project management experience

â–º Job descriptions:
â€“ Manage software development project including resource management, risk management, quality management

â–º Benefits:

â€“ Favorable & flexible working and leave policy
â€“ Work & development plan with 2 performance review/year
â€“ Fast-paced and young team environment
â–º Application:
